name: faucet-drainer-v2
description: ## How to use Make sure you have both [Node.js](https://nodejs.org) and npm installed. 1. Check your Node.js is ready ``` node -v ``` 2. Get the repository ``` git clone https://github.com/yhuag/faucet-drainer-v2.git cd faucet-drainer-v2 ``` 3. Install packages ``` npm i ``` 4. Start draining ``` node drain.js <PUT_YOUR_ADDRESS_HERE> ```
author: Jeff Hu
